data.title: Business
data.text:
Why Study Business?

The Business Department at De Anza College is one of the nation's leading two-year business programs, with courses, degrees and certificates that provide you with the competitive edge to excel in your career, transfer to a four-year university, or manage your own business.

We offer a wide range of business courses in management, marketing, human resource management, international business, business law, entrepreneurship and more. Our instructors are enthusiastic about sharing their in-depth knowledge and industry experience, while teaching practical skills in these fields.

Make a valuable investment in your future. Enroll in a De Anza business course now!

Meet Our Business Faculty

Full-Time Instructors

John Francis

Education: MBA, Management Information Systems, Drexel University; BS in Business Administration, Marketing, Drexel University

Focus: Retail Sales & Marketing, Digital Marketing, Business Analytics, Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), Category Management, Business Development, Marketing Communication, Sales Forecasting

Industry experience: Entertainment Industry - Warner Bros. Entertainment, Physical and Digital Home Entertainment, Physical and Digital Video Games, Mobile Video Games; Toys - Applause, Inc.; Small Business Consulting; College of the Canyons - Valencia, CA

Contact: FrancisJohn@deanza.edu

Office: F51g

Michele Fritz

Education: MBA, Harvard University; Masters in Education CSU East Bay; BS Business Administration, Boston University

Focus: Management, Marketing, Product Development, Information Technology, Operations Management.

Industry experience: GTE, Aspect Telecommunications, Data General, American Cyanamid, Johnson & Johnson, startups. Former Treasurer of the Board of the Humane Society Silicon Valley.

Contact: 408.864.8615 or FritzMichele@deanza.edu
